title: 8-Bit Action I & II - Game Music Pack - Chiptune, Arcade, Racing, 16-bit, 8bit
description: Made exclusively for Pixel Art Action games, 8-BIT ACTION is a game music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal heroes who want to save the princess, to talking animals that need to bring justice to a kingdom. 8-BIT ACTION is made for those stories that we all love.


Listen to the Soundtrack Packs here:


8-Bit Action I

8-Bit Action II



What’s Inside:


– 15 original high-quality music

– 15 original high-quality music loops

– 30 total files

– Unlimited Royalty-Free Usage


Tracklist:


8-Bit Action I

(00:00) 01 - Mapa

(00:33) 02 - Overture

(01:03) 03 - Gathering

(01:37) 04 - Danger

(02:07) 05 - Mini Game

(02:35) 06 - Shop

(03:09) 07 - Encounter

(03:36) 08 - Encounter (Alt Version)



Tracklist:


8-Bit Action II

(00:00) 01 - The Mission

(00:33) 02 - The Boss

(01:03) 03 - Carry On

(01:37) 04 - Challenge Accepted

(02:07) 05 - Overcome

(02:35) 06 - Race Begins

(03:09) 07 - Saw


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these game music/soundtrack packs, you also:


– Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered for seamless playback on any device.

– Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered for consistent volume throughout the soundtrack.

– Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, allowing for uninterrupted gameplay.


About composer:


Lufus is a music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks for multi-million downloaded games, including:




Support & help:


If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Technical Information


Audio file types: WAV

Sample rate: 44.8kHz

Bit depth: 32bit

Loopable: Yes

Additional: Stereo

Number of Audio WAVs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Minutes of audio provided: 24


Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: Yes
